Reviews.Title: Perfect combination.
Reviews.Author: LFZ62
Reviews.Content: This is what I want, a 18 - 300mm Zoom Lens. No more carry two lens. Just ordered too earlier, The price dropped too fast. $280 is not a small amount.

Reviews.Title: Good Package!
Reviews.Author: Sridev
Reviews.Content: I thought of getting all in one lens, so decided to buy 18-300mm considering all the pros and cons of the product with one good DSLR camera! Finally got it here:).Make sure if you would like to carry around 1 kg all the time but its fit for my needs!This is good suite for wild and travel photography.

Reviews.Title: nice kit
Reviews.Author: Nelson Vanegas
Reviews.Content: It is cheaper to get this kit with the 18-300 lens and getting the 18-55mm lens separately if you need it, although you end up with a few things you probably don't need. The tripod is heavy but it could be useful if you just use it at home or somewhere and you don't have to carry it.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) + <2> Nikon 18-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <6> Vivitar 77mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black) with 18-300mm VR Zoom Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Battery + Filter + Tripod + Accessory Kit
